name: Grounded. (flmsnr)
description:
idk what to add yet. you cant jump due to unity grounding you. movement is a bit weird. you will get stuck in places. if you want to exit the just press windows and exit. very early stuff. made it in about 3 hours so dont expect much.

- V0.2.1 you can jump now. map updated. movement updated. run from blocks. blocks dont do damage yet. will update models for enemies later on.

- V0.2.2 small change to game. blocks are now spheres (when you spawn it is right behind you). spheres are able to traverse the land more easily for some reason. Have fun with your sphere buddy that follows you around ig.
